WelcomPage.description1: Improve your fitness with the help of the latest artificial intelligence technology.
WelcomPage.description2: Workout categories will help you gain strength, get in better shape and embrace a healthy lifestyle.
WelcomPage.description3: With AI assistance, you can access a variety of different workout routines and save them in your app.

RegisterPagestep3.title: Tell Us About Yourself
RegisterPagestep3.description: To give you a better experience and results we need to know your gender

RegisterPagestep4.title: What is your goal
RegisterPagestep4.description: Choose your main objective. Don't worry you can always change it later.

RegisterPagestep5.description: Current height in cm. Don't worry you can always change it later.

RegisterPagestep7.title: What is Your Desired Weight
RegisterPagestep7.description: Target weight in kg. Don't worry this is just and estimation.

RegisterPagestep8.title: What is your Training Level?
RegisterPagestep8.description: Choose based on your current activity. This will help us to personalize plans for you.

RegisterPagestep10.description: Choose how often do you want to exercise. This will tune the perfect workout for you.

motivation.base: Achieve your fitness goals with a personal AI trainer designed just for you.
phrases: Stay consistent and results will follow!
Every workout is progress, no matter how small.
Your only limit is the one you set yourself!
Make today your best workout yet!
